pullrequest.title: More gazebo math deprecations in entities and joints

content.raw:
All the other `*Joint::GetAxis` are returning zero except for this one. This one returns always the same axis1 and ignores the index, even though this is a joint with 2 axes. This lead me to believe it's not a very useful function.

I can make the ignition math alternative if you prefer, but to me it looked like it wasn't worth it to perpetuate this API.
content.html:
All the other *Joint::GetAxis are returning zero except for this one. This one returns always the same axis1 and ignores the index, even though this is a joint with 2 axes. This lead me to believe it's not a very useful function.

I can make the ignition math alternative if you prefer, but to me it looked like it wasn't worth it to perpetuate this API.
